WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I have a polynom like this '2 * Pow(x,3) + 5 * Pow(x,2) + 5 * x + 3' and I have subsribed the EvaluateParameter event. When I evaluate the expression with the polynom the event is raised 3 times.
I think it is quite enough to raise the event once to set the ParameterArgs.Result.

Thanks for your project

Alpecin
